actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Admission Act for the State of Idaho to permit that State to exchange public lands and to use the proceeds derived from public lands for maintenance of those lands.

summary.text: Permits the State of Idaho under its Admission Act to exchange public lands and to use the proceeds derived from public lands for maintenance of those lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Admission Act for the State of Idaho to permit that State to exchange public lands and to use the proceeds derived from public lands for maintenance of those lands.
